item.title: Npc will not talk
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Try this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 692) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs.updateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdate = "Weapon store!"; } }

And stick it under your process() method in your npchandler class.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc will not talk
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

I hadded this in to my npchandler.

                if (npcs[i].npcType == 692) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "Weapon store!";
                    }
                }

but the npc nenver talk.
